serviceTypes.title: Wheelchair services
serviceTypes.description: NHS Wheelchair Services assess people with mobility needs, to decide what sort of wheelchair or other mobility equipment they should be provided with.

serviceTypes.title: AAC services
serviceTypes.description: Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) services help people. communicate as effectively as possible when speech is impaired.

serviceTypes.title: EC services
serviceTypes.description: An Environmental Control (EC) system can provide a level of independent control of many devices in the home for people with significant physical disabilities.
